description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A massive electrical failure has occurred in Power City. As a result, lines are surging, and the doors at the animal store opened automatically releasing dogs and hawks. Fixing the lines won't be easy, be sure to save money for better tools, faster boots, and Clones just in case. Do you have what it takes to restore electricity to Power City and become the #1 Hydro Electric Worker?
description.short: A massive electrical failure has occurred in Power City. As a result, lines are surging, and the doors at the animal store opened automatically releasing dogs and hawks. Fixing the lines won't be easy, be sure to save money for better tools, faster boots, and Clones just in case. Do you have what it takes to restore electricity to Power City and become the #1 Hydro Electric Worker?
